title: Upcomming Studio in a pet-friendly building! NHA- #106
posting_body: Wednesday, 6:00 pm-7:00 pm hosted by Tyler Miller -
Saturday, 1:00 pm-2:00 am hosted by Tyler Miller -
Near Financial District and Van Ness corridor
Garbage and water included in rent
No parking meters on Sutter St!
Two most recent pay stubs (or circle direct deposits on your bank statements)
Positive rental and credit history (minimum 600 credit score required)
Gross monthly income = 3 times the rent
If you do not meet any of this criteria we also accept Guarantor or co-signer applications!
930 Sutter St. is also within walking distance of  Civic Center Plaza, Union Square, Chinatown, Yerba Buena Gardens and the Asian Art Museum.
Landmark Building featured in Alfred Hitchcock's "Vertigo"
Building is located in Residential Parking zone C.
MUNI Bus lines(all within a 5 minute walk): 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 19, 27, 38, 45, 47, 49 and more!
MUNI Light Rail line: F - less than 10 minutes
MUNI BART Stations: Civic Center-15 minute walk; Powell Street Station-10 minute walk
BART provides easy access to the Embarcadero, Berkeley, Oakland, the San Francisco International Airport, as far South as Fremont, etc.
Coffee Shops: Philz Coffee, Dottie's Tru Blue Café, Blue Bottle Coffee
Restaurants: Nick's Crispy Tacos,  Farm : Table, Olea, Liholiho
Bars: Rum & Sugar, Bourbon and Branch, Nite Cap Bar
